an4.72:1.1: “Mendicants, when a mendicant has four things their practice is guaranteed, and they have laid the groundwork for ending the defilements.
an4.72:1.3: Thoughts of renunciation, good will, and harmlessness; and right view.
an4.72:1.4: When a mendicant has these four things their practice is guaranteed, and they have laid the groundwork for ending the defilements.”
